\maketitle

\begin{abstract}

The field of condensed matter physics had its genesis this century
and it has had a remarkable evolution. A closer look at its growth  
reveals a hidden aim in the collective consciousness of the field
- a part of the development this century is a kind of 
warm up exercise to understand the nature of living condensed matter, 
namely the field of biology, by a growing new breed of scientists 
in the coming century. Through some examples the vitality of this 
interaction will be pointed out.

\end{abstract}

\section{Introduction
author: G. Baskaran\cite{email}
title: Condensed Matter Physics - Biology Resonance
